content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Great food, great service, and an amazing vibe for a night out with the girls !! They also have the cutest photo booth to take pics !! and if you're there for a few drinks, their mango soju cocktail is our go to !
